amendment.description: Amendment ensures that students in certification programs are eligible for the Pell Grant Plus program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 109-399 to ensure that students in certification programs are eligible to receive Pell grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Cuellar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
